stanza.line: As a decrepit father takes delightdelight
To see his active child do deeds of youthyouth
So I made lame by Fortune dearest spitespite
Take all my comfort of thy worth and truthtruth
For whether beauty birth or wealth or witwit
Or any of these all or all or moremore
Entitled in thy parts do crowned sitsit
I make my love engrafted to this storestore
So then I am not lame poor nor despiseddespised
Whilst that this shadow doth such substance givegive
That I in thy abundance am sufficedsufficed
And by a part of all thy glory livelive
Look what is best that best I wish in theethee
This wish I have then ten times happy meme
